question: A.4 [1.0 point] Reactor is at full power. The operator immediately scrams all control rods into the core. This IMMEDIATE insertion of all control rods will cause: Given: T: reactor period, ℓ*: Prompt neutron lifetime; ρ: reactivity insertion; β: beta fraction

answers.answer: a. The delayed period to be equal to POSITIVE 80 seconds
answers.feedback: Incorrect. REFERENCE: Burn, R., Introduction to Nuclear Reactor Operations, © 1988, Sec 4.6, page 4-17.

answers.answer: b. A number of prompt neutrons equals to a number of delayed neutrons
answers.feedback: Incorrect. REFERENCE: Burn, R., Introduction to Nuclear Reactor Operations, © 1988, Sec 4.6, page 4-17.

answers.answer: c. The immediate period to be a function of the prompt neutron lifetime(T=ℓ*/ρ)

answers.answer: d. A sudden change of power that equals to the initial power multiplied by β(1- ρ)/(β-ρ)
answers.feedback: Correct. REFERENCE: Burn, R., Introduction to Nuclear Reactor Operations, © 1988, Sec 4.6, page 4-17.
